rounds.name: Taboo
rounds.rules: Be creative about describing the card value but don't say any word on the card!

rounds.name: Charades
rounds.rules: Let your inner actor out and help your team guess the card without saying a thing!

rounds.name: Password
rounds.rules: You can only utter a single word to get your team to guess the card!

rounds.name: Bonus
rounds.rules: Get creative - only use sounds or try a round of charades with a sheet over you
